channel.title: CBeebies Radio
channel.description: CBeebies Radio takes you to a world of sound and music, where you can share imaginative adventures and listen to stories with your favourite CBeebies friends and characters.
channel.itunes:summary: CBeebies Radio takes you to a world of sound and music, where you can share imaginative adventures and listen to stories with your favourite CBeebies friends and characters.
channel.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Hear To There – Sweet Shop
item.description:
Join Mrs Whichway for a trip to the shop that’s always full of yummy, scrummy sweets! What sounds will we HEAR as we travel THERE?
Mrs Whichway travels from here to there exploring sounds at various locations. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: What goodies will Mrs Whichway find in the sweet shop?
item.itunes:summary:
Join Mrs Whichway for a trip to the shop that’s always full of yummy, scrummy sweets! What sounds will we HEAR as we travel THERE?
Mrs Whichway travels from here to there exploring sounds at various locations. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Granny Anne's Joke World – Mess and Monkeys
item.description: Granny Anne tells a joke about a pair of cheeky monkeys making a mess in the bathroom. Will the children and Granny Anne be able to tidy up before Mum gets home? Granny Anne’s Joke World introduces children into a magical world where jokes come to life! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Two cheeky monkeys take over Max and Maya’s bathroom and create bubbly mess!
item.itunes:summary: Granny Anne tells a joke about a pair of cheeky monkeys making a mess in the bathroom. Will the children and Granny Anne be able to tidy up before Mum gets home? Granny Anne’s Joke World introduces children into a magical world where jokes come to life! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: The Funny Little Sketch Show – Chilly and Silly
item.description: In today’s show, Mrs Faraway does her happy dance and makes the studio VERY cold. Rhymer Rebel gets cheeky with a nursery rhyme, and in this weeks’ Silly Survey, Henrietta Sandwich asks people why they think penguins don’t wear glasses. Come and join us for lots of lovely laughs! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Find out why Norman is shivering, and why people think penguins don’t wear glasses!
item.itunes:summary: In today’s show, Mrs Faraway does her happy dance and makes the studio VERY cold. Rhymer Rebel gets cheeky with a nursery rhyme, and in this weeks’ Silly Survey, Henrietta Sandwich asks people why they think penguins don’t wear glasses. Come and join us for lots of lovely laughs! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Everything’s Rosie – Twinkle, Twinkle
item.description: Holly has never seen a shooting star, so Rosie organises a sleepover under Oakley to see if they can spot any. Meanwhile, Holly sets out to collect all the ‘stars’ that have fallen to the ground. With an educational element running through each episode, little listeners are engaged and have fun while learning. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Rosie organises a sleepover so that Holly can see the shooting stars.
item.itunes:summary: Holly has never seen a shooting star, so Rosie organises a sleepover under Oakley to see if they can spot any. Meanwhile, Holly sets out to collect all the ‘stars’ that have fallen to the ground. With an educational element running through each episode, little listeners are engaged and have fun while learning. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Story Time – We're Going On A Bear Hunt
item.description:
We’re going on a bear hunt, we’re going to catch a big one, what a beautiful day! We’re not scared...
Today's story was written by Michael Rosen and read by Emilia Fox and Kevin Whately. Snuggle up for a Walker Books story with your little one. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: We’re going on a bear hunt, we’re going to catch a big one, what a beautiful day!
item.itunes:summary:
We’re going on a bear hunt, we’re going to catch a big one, what a beautiful day! We’re not scared...
Today's story was written by Michael Rosen and read by Emilia Fox and Kevin Whately. Snuggle up for a Walker Books story with your little one. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Ministry Of Stories – Milly-Lilly And Jason
item.description:
The Chief wants another story, so Number Two and the children write a story about Milly-Lilly, the singing dog, and her best friend, Jason the flying pig!
The Ministry Of Stories encourages little listeners to engage their imaginations and tell stories. Why not encourage your little one to create a brilliant beginning, marvellous middle and excellent ending? #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Number Two and the children write a story about a flying pig and a singing dog!
item.itunes:summary:
The Chief wants another story, so Number Two and the children write a story about Milly-Lilly, the singing dog, and her best friend, Jason the flying pig!
The Ministry Of Stories encourages little listeners to engage their imaginations and tell stories. Why not encourage your little one to create a brilliant beginning, marvellous middle and excellent ending? #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Hear To There – Swimming Pool
item.description: Join Mrs Whichway on her adventure to the swimming pool. Mrs Whichway travels from here to there exploring sounds at various locations. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Join Mrs Whichway on her adventure to the swimming pool.
item.itunes:summary: Join Mrs Whichway on her adventure to the swimming pool. Mrs Whichway travels from here to there exploring sounds at various locations. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Granny Anne's Joke World – Dollies and Dinosaurs
item.description: Granny Anne tells a joke about a sleeping dinosaur and sure enough, one appears in Max’s bedroom! Derek the dinosaur causes lots of trouble – and lots of mess. Will the children and Granny Anne be able to fix things before Mum gets home? Granny Anne's Joke World introduces children into a magical world where jokes come to life! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Derek the baby dinosaur appears in Max’s bedroom, and plenty of things get broken!
item.itunes:summary: Granny Anne tells a joke about a sleeping dinosaur and sure enough, one appears in Max’s bedroom! Derek the dinosaur causes lots of trouble – and lots of mess. Will the children and Granny Anne be able to fix things before Mum gets home? Granny Anne's Joke World introduces children into a magical world where jokes come to life! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: The Funny Little Sketch Show – Sandwich Power!
item.description: Are you ready for Chef Sandwich’s cornflake cake disaster, an argument about who is Me and who is You, and a Funny Little Story about a lonely cow? Time to get giggling with a fun-packed show! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Power cut problems for Norman, and cornflake cake chaos for Chef Sandwich!
item.itunes:summary: Are you ready for Chef Sandwich’s cornflake cake disaster, an argument about who is Me and who is You, and a Funny Little Story about a lonely cow? Time to get giggling with a fun-packed show! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Story Time – Bringing Down The Moon
item.description: Mole thinks the moon is the most beautiful thing he has ever seen – and he wants it! Today's story was written by Jonathan Emmett and read by Kevin Whately. Snuggle up for a Walker Books story with your little one. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Mole thinks the moon is beautiful – but how will he get hold of it?
item.itunes:summary: Mole thinks the moon is the most beautiful thing he has ever seen – and he wants it! Today's story was written by Jonathan Emmett and read by Kevin Whately. Snuggle up for a Walker Books story with your little one. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Everything’s Rosie – Things That Go Glug In The Night
item.description: It’s night-time and nobody can get to sleep because of a funny rumbling noise coming from the garden. Raggles thinks it must be a Glug-Gurgle Monster, so Rosie and her friends decide to investigate! With an educational element running through each episode, little listeners are engaged and have fun while learning. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: There’s a funny rumbling sound in the garden and it's keeping everyone awake…
item.itunes:summary: It’s night-time and nobody can get to sleep because of a funny rumbling noise coming from the garden. Raggles thinks it must be a Glug-Gurgle Monster, so Rosie and her friends decide to investigate! With an educational element running through each episode, little listeners are engaged and have fun while learning. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: My Pet and Me – Assistance Dogs
item.description: Rory and Ferne hear from Vivi who has cerebral palsy, and she tells them about her assistance dog, Suzie, who helps her. We learn that Suzie is a pet as well as an assurance dog, and so Vivi has to help look after Suzie sometimes too. This series shows little listeners about the responsibility of looking after a pet. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Rory and Ferne meet Vivi and her amazing assistance dog, Suzie!
item.itunes:summary: Rory and Ferne hear from Vivi who has cerebral palsy, and she tells them about her assistance dog, Suzie, who helps her. We learn that Suzie is a pet as well as an assurance dog, and so Vivi has to help look after Suzie sometimes too. This series shows little listeners about the responsibility of looking after a pet. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Swashbuckle: Seaweed Radio – Hot, Hot, Hot
item.description: Cook (AKA DJ Cooky-Cook) and Line (AKA MC Line-O) struggle to stay awake during a particularly hot Seaweed Radio show. ‘Seaweed Radio’ is Cook and Line’s very own secret pirate radio show. You can listen to their broadcasts from their hidey-hut on the beach. But don’t tell Captain Captain!
item.itunes:subtitle: Cook and Line struggle to stay awake during a particularly hot Seaweed Radio show.
item.itunes:summary: Cook (AKA DJ Cooky-Cook) and Line (AKA MC Line-O) struggle to stay awake during a particularly hot Seaweed Radio show. ‘Seaweed Radio’ is Cook and Line’s very own secret pirate radio show. You can listen to their broadcasts from their hidey-hut on the beach. But don’t tell Captain Captain!
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Ministry Of Stories – Emily The Ice Dragon
item.description:
The Chief wants another story, so Number Two and the children write a story about an ice dragon!
The Ministry Of Stories encourages little listeners to engage their imaginations and tell stories. Why not encourage your little one to create a brilliant beginning, marvellous middle and excellent ending? #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Number Two and the children write a story about an ice dragon and her best friend, Sally!

item.title: CBeebies: Hear To There – Zoo
item.description:
ROAR like a tiger and swing from the branches like monkeys… Listen up, its time for a trip to the zoo!
Mrs Whichway travels from here to there exploring sounds at various locations. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Mrs Whichway is off to the zoo in today's adventure.
item.itunes:summary:
ROAR like a tiger and swing from the branches like monkeys… Listen up, its time for a trip to the zoo!
Mrs Whichway travels from here to there exploring sounds at various locations. #CBeebiesRadio

item.title: CBeebies: Granny Anne's Joke World – Bananas and Board Games
item.description: Today Granny Anne tells a joke about a banana that isn’t feeling very well. Sure enough a banana called Betty appears with a cold in the fruit bowl! Granny Anne’s Joke World introduces children into a magical world where jokes come to life! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: A poorly banana is made better by a doctor with a difference!
item.itunes:summary: Today Granny Anne tells a joke about a banana that isn’t feeling very well. Sure enough a banana called Betty appears with a cold in the fruit bowl! Granny Anne’s Joke World introduces children into a magical world where jokes come to life! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: The Funny Little Sketch Show – Crash Bash No-No Smash
item.description: Mrs Faraway doesn’t come in through the door today - she comes in through the ceiling! Our friend Selena Selfie loses her balance whilst trying to take a selfie in grown-up heels, and Winnie Weather gives us today’s Funny Little Forecast. Let’s get going with some great big giggles! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Mrs Faraway crashes through the ceiling and Selena Selfie falls off some shoes!
item.itunes:summary: Mrs Faraway doesn’t come in through the door today - she comes in through the ceiling! Our friend Selena Selfie loses her balance whilst trying to take a selfie in grown-up heels, and Winnie Weather gives us today’s Funny Little Forecast. Let’s get going with some great big giggles! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Everything’s Rosie – How Holly Got Her Groove Back
item.description: Holly gets stage fright just before a special dance performance. Rosie tries to help, but it’s only when Oakley offers to show Holly a few moves of his own that her inhibitions disappear! With an educational element running through each episode, little listeners are engaged and have fun while learning. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Holly gets stage fright when she tries to perform a special dance for Oakley.
item.itunes:summary: Holly gets stage fright just before a special dance performance. Rosie tries to help, but it’s only when Oakley offers to show Holly a few moves of his own that her inhibitions disappear! With an educational element running through each episode, little listeners are engaged and have fun while learning. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: My Pet and Me – Tree Frogs
item.description: Rory and Ferne hear from Connor and his pet tree frogs. We learn about their special tank and visit a special rescue centre. This series shows little listeners about the responsibility of looking after a pet. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Rory and Ferne meet Connor and hear all about his pet tree frogs!
item.itunes:summary: Rory and Ferne hear from Connor and his pet tree frogs. We learn about their special tank and visit a special rescue centre. This series shows little listeners about the responsibility of looking after a pet. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Swashbuckle: Seaweed Radio – Pirate Boot Camp
item.description: Captain Captain (AKA DJ Capitan Capitan) puts the boys through their paces during today’s Seaweed Radio show. ‘Seaweed Radio’ is Cook and Line’s very own secret pirate radio show. You can listen to their broadcasts from their hidey-hut on the beach. But don’t tell Captain Captain!
item.itunes:subtitle: Captain Captain puts the boys through their paces during today’s Seaweed Radio show.

You can listen to their broadcasts from their hidey-hut on the beach. But don’t tell Captain Captain!
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Tilly and Friends – Pru's Parade
item.description: Today feels like a do-something-fabulous day for Pru. It's the perfect day for a parade! Step through the front door of Tilly’s little yellow house and join her and her five best friends as they discover the world around them. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Today feels like a do-something-fabulous day for Pru. It's the perfect day for a parade!

item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Hear To There – The Moon
item.description: Mrs Whichway has never been to the Moon before… Do you know what sounds she might hear when she gets there? Mrs Whichway travels from here to there exploring sounds at various locations. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Join Mrs Whichway for her first visit to the Moon.
item.itunes:summary: Mrs Whichway has never been to the Moon before… Do you know what sounds she might hear when she gets there? Mrs Whichway travels from here to there exploring sounds at various locations. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Granny Anne's Joke World – Raisin Cakes and Racing Cats
item.description: Today Granny Anne tells a joke about a cat called Felix who races a poodle around the house causing mess and mayhem. Granny Anne’s Joke World introduces children into a magical world where jokes come to life! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: A cat causes chaos when he speeds round the children’s house - in a racing car!
item.itunes:summary: Today Granny Anne tells a joke about a cat called Felix who races a poodle around the house causing mess and mayhem. Granny Anne’s Joke World introduces children into a magical world where jokes come to life! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: The Funny Little Sketch Show – Press the Nonsense Button
item.description: Farmer Froggatt manages to tell us about the funniest idea he’s ever had, whilst Norman has a difficult time trying to understand Nicholas Nonsense, especially when he talks about having a nappy. Get ready for a good laugh with this fun-packed show! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Farmer Froggatt jokes about his horse, and Nicholas Nonsense talks about his nappy!
item.itunes:summary: Farmer Froggatt manages to tell us about the funniest idea he’s ever had, whilst Norman has a difficult time trying to understand Nicholas Nonsense, especially when he talks about having a nappy. Get ready for a good laugh with this fun-packed show! #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Everything’s Rosie – Across The Universe
item.description: Gathering outside his den for a feast, Big Bear tells Rosie and her friends about space and the stars, showing them the planets through his telescope. But as they play a game, Manny and Bluebird collide into it and break it! Can the friends work together to get their space mission back on track? With an educational element running through each episode, little listeners are engaged and have fun while learning. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Big Bear's telescope is broken – how will Rosie and friends be able to see the stars now?
item.itunes:summary: Gathering outside his den for a feast, Big Bear tells Rosie and her friends about space and the stars, showing them the planets through his telescope. But as they play a game, Manny and Bluebird collide into it and break it! Can the friends work together to get their space mission back on track? With an educational element running through each episode, little listeners are engaged and have fun while learning. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: My Pet and Me – Tortoises
item.description: Rory and Ferne hear from Lucy and her pet tortoises, at a special picnic. We learn how to care for them, and we hear Lucy giving the baby tortoises a bath! This series shows little listeners about the responsibility of looking after a pet. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Rory and Ferne meet Lucy and her pet tortoises!
item.itunes:summary: Rory and Ferne hear from Lucy and her pet tortoises, at a special picnic. We learn how to care for them, and we hear Lucy giving the baby tortoises a bath! This series shows little listeners about the responsibility of looking after a pet. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Swashbuckle: Seaweed Radio – Pirate Radio Awards
item.description: Cook (AKA DJ Cooky-Cook) and Line (AKA MC Line-O) try to win a shiny gold Pirate Radio Award. ‘Seaweed Radio’ is Cook and Line’s very own secret pirate radio show. You can listen to their broadcasts from their hidey-hut on the beach. But don’t tell Captain Captain!
item.itunes:subtitle: Cook (AKA DJ Cooky-Cook) and Line (AKA MC Line-O) try to win a Pirate Radio Award.

item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Tilly and Friends – Tilly And The Splodge
item.description: When Tilly and her friends discover a big, dirty splodge on Tilly’s favourite dress, they get their thinking caps on to find ways of getting rid of it. Step through the front door of Tilly’s little yellow house and join her and her five best friends as they discover the world around them. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Tilly finds a mark on her favourite dress so her friends help her get rid of it.
item.itunes:summary: When Tilly and her friends discover a big, dirty splodge on Tilly’s favourite dress, they get their thinking caps on to find ways of getting rid of it. Step through the front door of Tilly’s little yellow house and join her and her five best friends as they discover the world around them. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: The Sock Drawer
item.description: A story all about a little boy and his colourful socks. When Rossko stays with his Auntie Carol he discovers how different colours can make you feel a certain way. This story read by Debra Stephenson this story explores different colours and feelings whilst engaging with our little listeners' imaginations. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: A story all about a little boy and his colourful socks.
item.itunes:summary: A story all about a little boy and his colourful socks. When Rossko stays with his Auntie Carol he discovers how different colours can make you feel a certain way. This story read by Debra Stephenson this story explores different colours and feelings whilst engaging with our little listeners' imaginations. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:author: CBeebies Radio

item.title: CBeebies: Poppy's Day
item.description: Poppy's Day read by Falklands War veteran, Simon Weston, is a special story all about remembering. Poppy finds out about why we wear poppies and watches a remembrance parade. The story introduces little listeners to the importance of remembering not just things, but people too. #CBeebiesRadio
item.itunes:subtitle: Poppy finds out why we wear poppies and watches a remembrance parade.
